trans-unit.target: 高僧吟颂

trans-unit.source:
Choose one —
• You gain 5 life.
• Prevent the next 5 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn.
Entwine {2} (Choose both if you pay the entwine cost.)
trans-unit.target: 选择一项～你获得5点生命；或防止本回合中接下来将对目标生物造成的5点伤害。\n打包{2}（若你支付打包费用，则两项都选择。）
武装回应

trans-unit.source: CARDNAME deals damage to target attacking creature equal to the number of Equipment you control.
trans-unit.target: 武装回应对目标进行攻击的生物造成伤害，其数量等同于由你操控的武具数量。

trans-unit.target: 岩浆飞射对目标生物或牌手造成2点伤害。占卜2。
磁力窃取

trans-unit.source: Attach target Equipment to target creature. (Control of the Equipment doesn't change.)
trans-unit.target: 将目标武具装备在目标生物上。（武具的操控权并未改变）
法术力喷发

trans-unit.source: Add {R} for each tapped land your opponents control.
trans-unit.target: 所有对手每操控一个已横置的地，你便加{R}。
锈蚀雨

trans-unit.resname: 5DN·76 | Rain of Rust | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
Choose one —
• Destroy target artifact.
• Destroy target land.
Entwine {3}{R} (Choose both if you pay the entwine cost.)
trans-unit.target: 选择一项～消灭目标神器；或消灭目标地。\n打包{3}{R}（若你支付打包费用，则两项都选择。）
命转乾坤

trans-unit.resname: 5DN·77 | Reversal of Fortune | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target opponent reveals their hand. You may copy an instant or sorcery card in it. If you do, you may cast the copy without paying its mana cost.
trans-unit.target: 目标对手展示其手牌。你可以复制其中的一张瞬间或法术牌并使用此复制，且不须支付其法术力费用。

trans-unit.target: 直到回合结束，目标生物得+5/+0且获得敏捷异能。
星火元素

trans-unit.source: Trample, haste (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking. This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
trans-unit.target: 践踏，敏捷（若此生物将造成的战斗伤害足以消灭所有阻挡它的生物，你可以使它对防御牌手造成所剩余数量的伤害。 此生物受你操控时便能攻击与{T}。）

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 在回合结束时，牺牲星火元素。

五色晨曦

trans-unit.resname: 5DN·81 | All Suns' Dawn | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: For each color, return up to one target card of that color from your graveyard to your hand. Exile CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 对每种颜色而言，将至多一张目标该颜色的牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。放逐五色晨曦。
创生信标

trans-unit.resname: 5DN·82 | Beacon of Creation | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Create a 1/1 green Insect creature token for each Forest you control. Shuffle CARDNAME into its owner's library.
trans-unit.target: 你每操控一个树林，就将一个1/1绿色昆虫衍生物放置进场。将创生信标洗入其拥有者的牌库。

trans-unit.target: 绿曙光信使

trans-unit.source: You may pay {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} rather than pay this spell's mana cost.

trans-unit.target: 践踏

trans-unit.target: 由你操控的地具有「{T}：加一点任意颜色的法术力到你的法术力池中。」
莽撞奥夫

trans-unit.source: {G}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Counter target activated ability from an artifact source and destroy that artifact if it's on the battlefield. (Mana abilities can't be targeted.)
trans-unit.target: {G}，牺牲莽撞奥夫：反击来源为神器的目标起动式异能，且如果该神器在场，便将其消灭。（其目标不能是法术力异能）

trans-unit.target: 辉映（用过几种颜色的法术力来支付其费用，它进场时上面便有几个+1/+1指示物。）

trans-unit.source: Remove a +1/+1 counter from CARDNAME: CARDNAME gains your choice of flying, first strike, or haste until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 从辉月复仇者上移去一个+1/+1指示物：选择飞行，先攻，或是敏捷，辉月复仇者获得该异能直到回合结束。
构生菌魔像

trans-unit.source: Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.)
trans-unit.target: 神器共鸣（你每操控一个神器，使用此咒语的费用便减少{1}来使用）

trans-unit.source: Artifact creature spells you cast have affinity for artifacts. (They cost {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.)
trans-unit.target: 你使用的神器生物咒语具有神器共鸣异能。（你每操控一个神器，使用这类咒语的费用便减少{1}来使用）
四足秘耳

trans-unit.source: {3}: Switch CARDNAME's power and toughness until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: {3}：将四足秘耳之力量与防御力互换直到回合结束。
随侍秘耳

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, if CARDNAME is on the battlefield, each player returns all cards named CARDNAME from their graveyard to the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，若随侍秘耳在场，则每位牌手将所有名称为随侍秘耳的牌从其坟墓场中移回场上。
纽若克匿踪装

trans-unit.source: Equipped creature has shroud. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
trans-unit.target: 佩带此武具的生物不能成为咒语或异能的目标。

trans-unit.source: {U}{U}: Attach CARDNAME to target creature you control.
trans-unit.target: {U}{U}：将纽若克匿踪装装备在目标由你操控的生物上。

trans-unit.source: Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
trans-unit.target: 佩带{1}（{1}：装备在目标由你操控的生物上；佩带的时机视同法术。）

trans-unit.target: 辉映（用过几种颜色的法术力来支付其费用，它进场时上面便有几个充电指示物。）

trans-unit.source: Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

trans-unit.source: Sunburst (This enters the battlefield with a charge counter on it for each color of mana spent to cast it.)
trans-unit.target: 辉映（用过几种颜色的法术力来施放它，其进战场时上面便有几个充电指示物。）

trans-unit.source: Remove a charge counter from CARDNAME: Add one mana of any color.
trans-unit.target: 从五色棱镜上移去一个充电指示物：加一点任意颜色的法术力。
着魔时空通道

trans-unit.source: If a player would draw a card, that player skips that draw instead.
trans-unit.target: 若任何牌手将抓一张牌，改为该牌手略过该次抓牌。

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of each end step, each player sacrifices a permanent unless they discard a card.
trans-unit.target: 在每个回合结束时，每位牌手除非从其手上弃掉一张牌，否则该牌手牺牲一个永久物。
锐草围屏
（墙不能攻击）

trans-unit.source: CARDNAME blocks each combat if able.
trans-unit.target: 锐草围屏每回合若能进行阻挡，则必须阻挡PR
锐鬃异狮

trans-unit.source: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
trans-unit.target: 先攻（此生物会比不具先攻异能的生物提前造成战斗伤害。）

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice CARDNAME unless you discard a card.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，除非你弃一张牌，否则牺牲锐鬃异狮。

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your draw step, you may have CARDNAME deal 3 damage to target creature.
trans-unit.target: 在你的抓牌步骤开始时，你可以让锐鬃异狮对目标生物造成3点伤害。
回收工段

trans-unit.source: {T}: Return target noncreature artifact card with mana value 1 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: {T}：将目标非生物，且总法术力费用等于或小于1的神器牌从你的坟墓场移回场上。

trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature dies, you may untap CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个生物从场上进入坟墓场时，你可以重置回收工段。

trans-unit.target: 从锯齿挥扫兽上移去两个+1/+1指示物：锯齿挥扫兽得+4/+4直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: No more than one creature can attack each combat.

trans-unit.source: No more than one creature can block each combat.
trans-unit.target: 每次战斗中，进行阻挡的生物不能多于一个。
锁颅槛

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, CARDNAME deals 2 damage to that player unless they have exactly three or exactly four cards in hand.
trans-unit.target: 在每位对手的维持开始时，除非该牌手的手牌数量为正好三张或正好四张，否则锁颅槛对他造成2点伤害。

trans-unit.source: Imprint — When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may exile a card from your hand face down.
trans-unit.target: 压印～当召唤师封卵进场时，你可以将一张牌从你手上面朝下地移出对战。（被移出对战的牌压印在此神器上）

trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME dies, turn the exiled card face up. If it's a creature card, put it onto the battlefield under your control.
trans-unit.target: 当召唤师封卵从场上进入坟墓场时，将所压印的牌面朝下之牌翻回正面。若该牌是生物牌，则将该牌在你的操控下放置进场。

trans-unit.source: Whenever an artifact is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may untap CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个神器从场上进入坟墓场时，你可以重置召唤工段。

trans-unit.source: You may choose not to untap CARDNAME during your untap step.
trans-unit.target: 你可选择于你的重置步骤中不重置维多肯枷锁。

trans-unit.source: {2}, {T}: Gain control of target creature with power less than or equal to the number of Islands you control for as long as CARDNAME remains tapped.
trans-unit.target: {2}，{T}：选择目标力量小于或等于由你操控之海岛数量的生物。只要维多肯枷锁持续被横置，你便获得目标生物的操控权。
